Solitaire, Klondike or Patience, is a game that requires 1 player and a standard 52 deck of playing cards. The objective of Solitaire is to organize a shuffled deck of cards into 4 stacks (one for each suit) in ascending order (Ace to King). Cash Solitaire is a great choice for everyone to train the brain and have fun! Return to the timeless PC Klondike classic as it comes to your phone so that you can play it anytime, anywhere!
